You mention samples being used. Will they be kept afterwards as reference material? Or are they destroyed in the process? If kept, then describe their storage and preservation. And also good to include them in the data list in 1.

7. Data sharing
Which data repository would you use? There's KU Leuven RDR (research data repository): https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr  This can handle embargoes for valorisation.
